content: I'm really interested in exploring the natural wonders of Bali, especially the Uluwatu Sunset and the Tegalalang Rice Terraces. I'd also love to try some of the local cuisine and drinks, like the coffee plantation and trying some Bintang beer. Additionally, I think it would be great to experience some of the local culture and spirituality, like visiting the Ubud Monkey Forest and the Tirtha Empul Temple.
